===== Kubuntu membership of smartboyhw =====
'''Presented by:''' Howard Chan - Kubuntu membership applicant

Howard Chan (smartboyhw) applied for Kubuntu membership and was asked a few questions by the present Kubuntu Council members. The voting results are: For: 2 Abstain: 1 Against: 0. Although in the meeting Howard only received 2 for votes, Jonathan Riddell has voted a for vote beforehand and the total number of for votes (3) reaches the quorum of approval of Kubuntu membership applications in the Kubuntu Council. Henceforth Howard was elected as a Kubuntu member.
